text:
Class of Service
This is a full-rate
Telegram or Cable¬
gram unless its de¬
ferred character is in¬
dicated by a suitable
symbol above or pre¬
ceding the address.
CT.NA037 LONG NL 13=
* FRANK SCHOOLEY, WILL*
352 AUd 14 AM 5
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS URBANA ILL*
:re SCHRAMM MEMO CONCERNING MILES SUCCESSOR, NAMES SUGGESTED
ARE WILLIAM HARLEY, IRVING MERRILL, MERRITT LUDWIG, RUSSEL
PORTER, KEITH TYLER, NONE OF THESE HAS BEEN APPROACHED OR
IS AWARE OF BEING CONSIDERED. BECAUSE QUORUM NOT LIKELY TO
BE AT AMES-REQUEST YOU WIRE CHOICE IMMEDIATELY IN 1-2-3
ORDER OR INDICATE OTHER CHOICES. BOTH SCHRAMM AND VAN DUYNE
FEEL CHOICE SHOULD BE MADE WITHOUT DELAY TO PERMIT
INDOCTRINATION*
-SEYMOUR N SIEGEL PRESIDENT NAEB=.
THE COMPANY WILL APPRECIATE SUGGESTIONS FROM ITS PATRONS CONCERNING ITS SERVICE * ^ J
/ ♦
